document.full_text: iran has received another shipment of nuclear fuel from russia for use at its bushehr nuclear power plant, the arabic-language al alam channel quoted an official as saying wednesday.
document.title: iran gets another nuclear fuel batch from russia: report
lines_and_colors: iran has received another shipment of nuclear fuel from russia for use at its bushehr nuclear power plant, the arabic-language al alam channel quoted an official as saying wednesday.
